ami-85c50dea: Must be a valid IP range in x.x.x.x/x notation.  Use 0.0.0.0/0 for no restrictions.
Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -v
', u'/sbin/service splunk stop
', u'export LOCALIP=$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/local-ipv4)
', u'export INSTANCEID=$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id)
', u'printf '%s	%s
' "$LOCALIP" 'splunk' >> /etc/hosts
', u'hostname splunk
', u'mv /opt/splunk/etc/passwd /opt/splunk/etc/passwd.bak
', u'mkdir -p /opt/splunk/.splunk ; chown splunk:splunk /opt/splunk/.splunk
', u'mkdir -p /opt/splunk/etc/licenses/enterprise
', u'usermod --expiredate 1 splunk
', u"sed -i 's/force-change-pass true//' /etc/init.d/splunk
", u'/opt/splunk/bin/splunk start --accept-license
', u'HOME=/opt/splunk /opt/splunk/bin/splunk edit user admin -password ', {u'Ref': u'SplunkAdminPassword'}, u' -role admin -auth admin:changeme
', u'touch /opt/splunk/etc/.ui_login
', u'wget -qO /opt/splunk/etc/apps/splunk_AWS_app.tgz https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/splk-gsa/splunk-app-502.tgz
', u'wget -qO /opt/splunk/etc/apps/splunk_AWS_TA.tgz https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/splk-gsa/splunk-TA-422.tgz
', u'cd /opt/splunk/etc/apps && tar zxf splunk_AWS_TA.tgz && rm -f splunk_AWS_TA.tgz
', u'cd /opt/splunk/etc/apps && tar zxf splunk_AWS_app.tgz && rm -f splunk_AWS_app.tgz
', u'chown -R splunk:splunk /opt/splunk/etc/apps
', u'mkdir -p /opt/splunk/etc/users/admin/user-prefs/local
', u'echo "[general]" >> /opt/splunk/etc/users/admin/user-prefs/local/user-prefs.conf
', u'echo "eai_app_only = False" >> /opt/splunk/etc/users/admin/user-prefs/local/user-prefs.conf
', u'echo "eai_results_per_page = 25" >> /opt/splunk/etc/users/admin/user-prefs/local/user-prefs.conf
', u'echo "default_namespace = splunk_app_aws" >> /opt/splunk/etc/users/admin/user-prefs/local/user-prefs.conf
', u'/opt/splunk/bin/splunk restart
']]}}
